amendment.description: To ensure the balance of privacy and civil liberties.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3923 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3923 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S10351-10358; text: CR S10355) To ensure the balance of privacy and civil liberties.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3923 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3923 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Durbin.
